verbs.description: [ARGM-TMP: Yesterday] [ARG0: the NFL] [V: kneeled] [ARG2: to Donald Trump and conservatives] [ARGM-MNR: by passing a new policy barring players from taking a knee and peacefully protesting during the national anthem and imposing a fine on all teams that permit such a freedom of expression] . ...
